list.description:
решил сам сделать рисуночек, мне понравилось.

установка кастомного прицела:

1. Скачать архив
2. Распаковать в папку с игрой (если со стима C:\Steam\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\(тут создать папку с названием танка на который хотите прицел, название можно найти на официальной вики выбрав нужный танк и посмотрев в адресной строке, например ussr_t_55_amd_1 и в нее распаковать скачанный прицел), если с лаунчера C:\пользователи\AppData\Local\WarThunderDev\UserSights(тут то же самое).
3. Если игра была запущена перезапустите, выбираете нужный танк, в настройках выбираете основные,...

I made this sight a while ago and forgot to upload. Hopefully someone will find it useful.

Note that the Cromwell V (RP-3) cannot elevate or depress its launcher. This sight is only useful on flat terrain as a consequence. Fortunately many maps fit that criteria.

#cromwell_rp3 #rp3 #cromwellrp3 #cromwell_mk5_rp3

Was working on another one for YiXuan, but there were 6 toes on one foot so I had to settle for this one. Sorry if it doesn't look as good as the ai art piece, but I'm not an artist and I just wanted to add a Yi Xuan feet sight. Majority of her feet art were digusting and NSFW and meanwhile this one on collection was the cleanest, SFW, and DIDNT HAVE 6 TOES. Artist is Nyxelune. Enjoy!

THERMAL SIGHT FOR THE EXTERNAL CAMERA OF THE "SHTURM-SM" ATGM SYSTEM

This sight is historical (i.e., identical to the real sight on this vehicle).

• The aiming reticle is designed for use on the 9P149 "SHTURM-S" with a thermal imager.
• The aiming reticle's dimensions are calibrated for accurate range estimation based on target size in the War Thunder game.

This sight was recreated based on video footage from the external camera system installed on modern 9K132 (9P149M) "Shturm-SM" systems. These cameras are used for tracking the missile and recording combat operations.
